sources.title: 1938 Gastspiel Im Paradies ( Hilde Krahl, Albert Matterstock, Oscar Sima, Max Gülstorff, Gustav Waldau, Bruno Hübner)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1938. Gastspiel im Paradies.  U.a mit Hilde Krahl und Oscar Sima

metadata.Plot: Not exactly Paradise and not up to par e.g. with Hartl's "Der Mann der Sherlock Holmes war" (made one year before), but still very agreeable, relaxed and easy comedy. The well written script has nice dialogue and a bunch of (bit) characters who make this film a  pleasure to watch. Hilde Krahl and Albert Matterstock are a fine match; Oskar Sima's contribution is, alas, a bit poorish.I had the impression that "Hollywood" (screwball comedy)  was used as example, but could not pin it down to a specific film.
metadata.Actors: Hilde Krahl, Albert Matterstock, Georg Alexander
